src.stt.transform_speech_data module¶

Description:

Transform the speech data to be used by the model

Usage:

$ python src/data/transform_speech_data.py -s

Possible arguments:

  • -s or –save: Save the data

src.stt.transform_speech_data.create_labels_and_input_values(train_ds: Dataset, val_ds: Dataset, test_ds: Dataset) → tuple[datasets.arrow_dataset.Dataset, datasets.arrow_dataset.Dataset, datasets.arrow_dataset.Dataset, transformers.models.wav2vec2.processing_wav2vec2.Wav2Vec2Processor]¶

Create labels and input values for the model

Parameters:

  • train_ds (Dataset) – Training dataset

  • val_ds (Dataset) – Validation dataset

  • test_ds (Dataset) – Test dataset

Returns:

Training, validation and test datasets with labels and input values

Return type:

tuple[Dataset, Dataset, Dataset, Wav2Vec2Processor]

src.stt.transform_speech_data.create_vocab(folder_path: str, train_ds: Dataset, val_ds: Dataset, test_ds: Dataset) → None¶

Create vocab file from datasets

Parameters:

  • folder_path (str) – Path to the folder where the vocab file will be saved

  • train_ds (Dataset) – Train dataset

  • val_ds (Dataset) – Validation dataset

  • test_ds (Dataset) – Test dataset

src.stt.transform_speech_data.preprocess_data(train_ds: Dataset, val_ds: Dataset, test_ds: Dataset) → tuple[datasets.arrow_dataset.Dataset, datasets.arrow_dataset.Dataset, datasets.arrow_dataset.Dataset]¶

Preprocess the data. Remove special characters and resample the audio to 16kHz.

Parameters:

  • train_ds (Dataset) – Training dataset

  • val_ds (Dataset) – Validation dataset

  • test_ds (Dataset) – Test dataset

Returns:

Preprocessed training, validation and test datasets

Return type:

tuple[Dataset, Dataset, Dataset]

src.stt.transform_speech_data.recreate_folder(folder_path: str)¶

Recreates a folder if it exists

Parameters:

folder_path (str) – Path to the folder to be recreated

src.stt.transform_speech_data.remove_special_characters(batch: Example, train: Optional[bool] = True) → Example¶

Remove special characters from the dataset

Parameters:

  • batch (Example) – Batch of data

  • train (Optional[bool], optional) – Checks if batch belongs to train dataset, by default True

Returns:

Batch with special characters removed

Return type:

Example

src.stt.transform_speech_data.save_datasets(train_ds: Dataset, val_ds: Dataset, test_ds: Dataset) → None¶

Save the datasets to the processed folder

Parameters:

  • train_ds (Dataset) – Training dataset

  • val_ds (Dataset) – Validation dataset

  • test_ds (Dataset) – Test dataset

src.stt.transform_speech_data.transform_dataset(batch: Example, processor: Wav2Vec2Processor) → Example¶

Transform dataset to be used by the model

Parameters:

  • batch (Example) – Batch of data

  • processor (Wav2Vec2Processor) – Processor to use

Returns:

Batch with transformed data

Return type:

Example
